metadata.title: Knight Inlet Acoustic Doppler Current Profiler data, 1995
metadata.description: Acoustic doppler current profiler data, current meter data, thermistor chain data of Knight Inlet in 1995. Sill area in particular, time-series data, yo-yo CTD data.
keywords: South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Constructing models of circulation in Knight Inlet

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Data not secured in regional data centre .
Risk of Loss: Medium
Impact Justification: Data used for one time analysis.
Impact of Loss: Low
Recommended Action: Bring data to archives.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Unknown

Use constraints: Collaborative research with Office of Naval Research (U.S.); some may still be proprietary

Distribution liability: [unknown]
